biography:
Gin Clarke was first spotted by French designer Jean-Paul Gaultier whilst on a trip in London. Soon her tall athletic figure and beautifully shaped bald head were gracing catwalks all over Europe. Her look was copied by a number of young, black models, especially in the UK where many bald black women modeled for UK shows in the mid-90s.

She no longer does catwalk modelling, but has appeared in the movies Le cinquième élément

 (1997), the latest Star War films and several music videos. Her clean-shaven head has been a permanent feature and become the most important part of her look.  - IMDb Mini Biography
name: Gin Clarke
